doc-91962789cc99acc82ce666e417a8b8d1.content: Effective writing requires clear structure and compelling characters. Start with a strong hook to grab the reader's attention. Develop characters with distinct voices and motivations. Use active voice and show rather than tell. Edit ruthlessly to eliminate unnecessary words.
